description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Spartan city phase, where Infantry cost 10% less metal but take 10% longer to train.
tooltip: Advance to City Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius, 40% more garrison capacity and +5 range . Structures +5 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. All Citizens 15% more health, 1% faster run/walk, and 20% less metal, but 15% more train time. Infantry gain 1.0 pierce and 0.5 hack armor.
